The first time a player receives an achievement for bashing a person's face in a certain way they will be hooked.
FIFA 08 is not the first next-gen soccer game, but it's the first one to really feel like a full next-gen game.

Great single player campaign that’ll last you quite a while if you’re going for 100% completion, although multiplayer is a bit of a let down.
While there are certainly flaws in the single player and multiplayer, the gameplay, fantastic visuals and engaging storyline make it a worthy.

Tiger Woods PGA Tour 08 is the best Tiger Woods yet but really feels like an incremental upgrade over last year’s game.

Usually games that tend to offer something for everyone, end up being nothing for nobody. Moto GP 06 is an exceptional exception to that rule.

A very original take on shooters. An addictive arcade-style blast for score junkies. [Feb 2008, p.66]
